thread.title: Ravi century takes Deccan to seven-wkt victory
thread.title_full: Ravi century takes Deccan to seven-wkt victory

title: Ravi century takes Deccan to seven-wkt victory
text:
Ravi century takes Deccan to seven-wkt victory Ravi century takes Deccan to seven-wkt victory October 17,2015,Bengaluru, DHNS 
Powered by an unbeaten 102 from Ravikumar, Deccan United Cricket Club strolled to a convincing seven-wicket victory over Friends Cricket Team in the KSCA Group-I, Division-IV, league-cum-knockout tournament for the Metro Shield here. Batting first, Friends were bowled out for 230 in 50 overs, with the only notable contributions coming from Ashrith T, who top scored with 80 and Sharbanna (49), while Murali B picked up 3/35 for Deccan United.In response, Deccan United overhauled Friends’ total in 33.4 overs without breaking a sweat. Ravikumar’s unbeaten ton and a valuable 65 from Praveen ensured that the victory was a comfortable one. Brief scores: Friends Cricket Team: 230 all out in 50 overs (Mayank Rana 30, Ashrith T 80, Sharbanna 49; Murali B 3-35) lt to Deccan United Cricket Club: 236/3 in 33.4 overs (Ravikumar 102 n.o., Praveen 65).Southern Cricketers: 255 all out in 48.1 overs (Sai Kumar 31, Vijay 91, Vishal 69; Anand 4-51, Anuraj 2-20) lt to Star Sports Club, Nelamangala: 206/5 in 37.2 overs (Srikanth 39, Ravikumar 57, Pradeep 37 n.o; Sunil 2-46). (Target revised to 205 in 40 overs due to rain). Viswesarapuram Cricket Club (2): 299/8 in 50 overs (Nithin M 95, Yeregoud 88, Joseph 42 n.o.; Nikhil 4-37) bt Sangam Cricket Association: 255 all out in 48.1 overs (Arun 72, Raghu 44, Nikhil 93; Anand 3-10, Yere Goud 2-42, Nithin 2-49).Duleep Cricketers: 223/9 in 50 overs (Ramakrishna Verma 32, Jayaprakash 45, Ashoka N 54, Bharath V 26, Sumukh SB 25; Kishan R 5-32) vs BEL Colony Recreation Club: 72/0 in 16 overs (Beerappa 26 n.o., Ajay G Suresh 39 n.o.). (Match called off due to rain).
